title: Code Builder App
body: An app for developers who want to create, save, and share code snippets. Includes authorization via GitHub.
tools: Next.js, TypeScript, SWR, Next-auth, Monaco-editor, MongoDB, HTML, CSS

title: Meal-sharing App
body: An app for those who want to share a meal. The user can create a meal, leave a review about a meal, and place an order.
tools: React, Material UI, Formik, Axios, Styled-Components, MySQL, Node.js, JS, HTML, Docker

title: Phone-book App
body: Private phone book. The user can register a new account, log into an existing account, add a contact, delete a contact, and search by name.
tools: React, Redux, Material UI, Formik, Axios, Styled-Components, JS, HTML

title: Image-gallery App
body: An app for images search by name.
tools: React using Classes, JS, HTML, Styled-Components

title: Movies App
body: An app where users can see trending movie announcements, search movies by name, and see details.

title: Ice Cream
body: A page where users can read about ice cream and see cafe working times and locations.
